metadata.title: CVE-2024-31444 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti provides an operational monitoring and fault management framework.Prior to version 1.2.27, some of the data stored in`automation_tree_rules_form_save()` function in `automation_tree_rules.php`is not thoroughly checked and is used to concatenate the HTML statement in`form_confirm()` function from `lib/html.php` , finally resulting incross-site scripting. Version 1.2.27 contains a patch for the issue.

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
